name: lambda-genbot
description: Uses generative AI to create image based on given prompt
author: CASE

scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --template-file template.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-prefix lambda-genbot --s3-bucket case-consulting-mgmt-sam-deployments --stack-name lambda-genbot --profile mgmt
scripts.local: npm run build && sam local invoke GenBotFunction -e event.json --profile mgmt
